ValidationRule.description: Prevents the Billing Completeion Date field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Billing_Audit_Completion_Date__c) && NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Billing_Audit_Completion_Date__c))) && ( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Field Ops Manager")) && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Manager') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Service Manager') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Implementation Manager I') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Implementation Manager I') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Implementation Manager I') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Implementation Manager II') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Implementation Manager I') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Implementation Manager II') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team A)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team B)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team C)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team D)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team E)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'IMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team F)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team A)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team B)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team C)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team D)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team F)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'NMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team G)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team A)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team B)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team C)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team D)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team E)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team A)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team B)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team C)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team D)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'PMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team E)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team A)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team B)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team C)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team E)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team F)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor I (Team H)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team A)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team B)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team C)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team D)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team E)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team F)') && NOT($UserRole.Name = 'RMPSC Imp Supervisor II (Team H)') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the Implementation Supervisor or Manager can modify the Billing Completion Date field after the initial entry.
